t: Amazon.com: Bioweaves 100% Organic Cotton 1 Flat Sheet Only, 300 Thread Count Soft Sateen Weave GOTS Certified Top Sheet - White, Twin XL : Home & Kitchen
s: I heartily recommend this brand of sheets. ... I've had these sheets for just a few days, but I'm very happy with the quality of stitching and the softness and comfort, even though they are not super-high thread count sheets. Organic is important to me, but the hefty price tags you see at places like Company Store and Coyuchi are a big deterrent. I also like that I could buy two individual flat sheets and not the usual flat/fitted package. Thanks, BioWeaves...

t: Amazon.com: Bioweaves Organic Waterproof Mattress Protector – GOTS Certified Organic Cotton Mattress Cover Queen with Breathable Piqué Weave top Layer – 20 Inch Deep Pocket, White : Home & Kitchen
s: I have a Purple brand mattress and bought the Purple brand mattress protector, which was awful. Good money was wasted on it. After about 3 months' use, the backing literally became stuck/glued to the mattress and left a nasty wax film that I've steam cleaned multiple times and still can't get out. That's why I love the Bioweaves ...
